metadata.title: CVE-2024-23084 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Apfloat v1.10.1 was discovered to contain anArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException via the componentorg.apfloat.internal.DoubleCRTMath::add(double[], double[]). NOTE: this isdisputed by multiple third parties who believe there was not reasonableevidence to determine the existence of a vulnerability. The submission mayhave been based on a tool that is not sufficiently robust for vulnerabilityidentification.

criterions.comment: libapfloat-java package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
